entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
